description: Discover the best hotels in Moorea-Maiao, French Polynesia. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.vendor_name: Sofitel Kia Ora Moorea Beach Resort
hotels.title: French Polynesian Paradise in Mo'orea with Fine-Dining & Spa
hotels.description: This French Polynesian Sofitel paradise is surrounded by mesmerising waters and views of the island of Tahiti. A blissful escape on glistening white sands, embrace relaxation amid lagoon waters and tropical gardens. Explore the vibrant underwater world of the Moorea Lagoon, teeming with colourful marine life, or venture to the island's verdant mountains and cascading waterfalls. Your overwater bungalow awaits as French luxury meets Polynesian hospitality. The resort offers a range of dining options, including K Restaurant, known for it's fusion of French and Polynesian cuisine. Unwind at Le Jardin Spa in a range of treatments inspired by local ingredients and traditions.

seo.title: Hotels in Moorea-Maiao - French Polynesia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
